00061 
00062 #if !defined(_16F1512) && !defined(_16LF1512)
00063 #if !defined(_16F1513) && !defined(_16LF1513)
00064     #error The current mTouch hardware include file does not support this PIC microcontroller.
00065 #endif
00066 #endif
00067 
00068 #if defined(_16F1512) || defined(_16LF1512)
00069     #if MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 17
00070         #error The PIC16F/LF1512 is not able to support more than 17 sensors due to pinout limitations.
00071     #endif
00072 #endif
00073 #if defined(_16F1513) || defined(_16LF1513)
00074     #if MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 17
00075         #error The PIC16F/LF1513 is not able to support more than 17 sensors due to pinout limitations.
00076     #endif

00084 //===========================================================
00085 //  Communications Configuration
00086 //===========================================================
00087 #define PIC_UART_AVAILABLE
00088 #define PIC_UART_BAUD_BITS                  16
00089 
00090 #define PIC_TIMER0_AVAILABLE
00091 #define PIC_TIMER1_AVAILABLE
00092 #define PIC_TIMER2_AVAILABLE
00093 
00094 //===========================================================
00095 //  ADC Configuration
00096 //===========================================================
00097 #define PIC_ADC_BITS                10
00098 #define PIC_ADC_HCVD_AVAILABLE
00099 #define PIC_ADC_HCVD_ADDCAP_MAX     7
00100 
00101 #if defined(_16F1516) || defined(_16F1518)
00102     #define PIC_ADC_UNIMP_AVAILABLE
00103 #endif
00104 
00105 #define PIC_ADC_ADCS                ADCON1bits.ADCS
00106 #define PIC_ADC_ADFM                ADCON1bits.ADFM
00107 #define PIC_ADC_ADON                ADCON0bits.ADON
00108 
00109 #define PIC_ADC_ADCS_FOSC2          0b000
00110 #define PIC_ADC_ADCS_FOSC4          0b100
00111 #define PIC_ADC_ADCS_FOSC8          0b001
00112 #define PIC_ADC_ADCS_FOSC16         0b101
00113 #define PIC_ADC_ADCS_FOSC32         0b010
00114 #define PIC_ADC_ADCS_FOSC64         0b110
00115 #define PIC_ADC_ADCS_FRC            0b111
00116 
00117 #define PIC_ADC_ADFM_RIGHT          1
00118 #define PIC_ADC_ADFM_LEFT           0
00119 
00120 #if     _XTAL_FREQ == 32000000 
00121     #error This processor does not support 32 MHz internal Fosc. Please change _XTAL_FREQ in mTouch_config.h to the the actual Fosc value as set by the OSCCON register.
00122 #elif   _XTAL_FREQ == 16000000 
00123     #define PIC_ADC_SETCLK()    PIC_ADC_ADCS = PIC_ADC_ADCS_FOSC16
00124     #define PIC_ADC_TAD         1 
00125 #elif   _XTAL_FREQ ==  8000000 
00126     #define PIC_ADC_SETCLK()    PIC_ADC_ADCS = PIC_ADC_ADCS_FOSC8
00127     #define PIC_ADC_TAD         1  
00128 #elif   _XTAL_FREQ ==  4000000 
00129     #define PIC_ADC_SETCLK()    PIC_ADC_ADCS = PIC_ADC_ADCS_FOSC4
00130     #define PIC_ADC_TAD         1 
00131 #elif   _XTAL_FREQ ==  2000000 
00132     #define PIC_ADC_SETCLK()    PIC_ADC_ADCS = PIC_ADC_ADCS_FOSC2
00133     #define PIC_ADC_TAD         1
00134 #elif   _XTAL_FREQ ==  1000000 
00135     #define PIC_ADC_SETCLK()    PIC_ADC_ADCS = PIC_ADC_ADCS_FOSC2
00136     #define PIC_ADC_TAD         2
00137 #else
00138     #error No predefined ADC clock values for the chosen _XTAL_FREQ.
00139 #endif
00140

00145 //===========================================================

00151 #define PIC_SWDTEN_AVAILABLE
00152 #define PIC_SWDTEN_OFF()                WDTCONbits.SWDTEN = 0
00153 #define PIC_SWDTEN_ON()                 WDTCONbits.SWDTEN = 1

00162 //===========================================================
